summary: THE BRAKES ON THIS CAR ARE TERRIBLE!  I HAVE BEEN IN AND OUT OF THE SHOP SINCE THIS CAR WAS BOUGHT.  I HAVE HAD NUMEROUS PAD AND ROTOR REPLACEMENTS.  I EVEN GOT INTO A REAR-END ACCIDENT 1 1/2 YEARS AGO THAT I COULD HAVE AVOIDED WITH COMPETENT BRAKES.  I NOW HAVE TO REPLACE THE DRUMS AND REAR SHOES BECAUSE THEY HAVE BEEN WORKING OVERTIME TO COMPENSATE FOR THE POOR FRONT BRAKES.  THANKS A BUNCH KIA!  WORST CAR I'VE EVER DRIVEN.
